data.persona: I live in a large city, but I am leaving it behind.  There is too much noise in this city and I can't take it any more.  I seek to live in the peaceful and more quiet countryside.
data.description:
You are in the Town center.
A lavish town full of stone buildings, most of which are two or 3 stories. They have ornate tin gutter fixtures with the water seeming to pour from the mouths of different animals. They almost all have wooden plaques next to the doors describing the nature of their business. the buildings are almost touching eachother, and the narrow streets are so filled with people, donkeys pulling carts, and unruly children its near impossible to walk by without bumping into something.
The king is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a hiking boots, a shirt, a hats, and a boot.

data.short_motivation: I want to steal from the king
data.mid_motivation: I hope to escape the town today with my loot
data.long_motivation: I plan to buy a house in the more quiet countryside in two weeks
